short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show everything on any website in gray and white color

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gray is beautiful, This extension will help you making every website beautiful as you want on your lovely Chrome Browser itself just enable the plugin, and click on the button.

When you want to see back those colors just click the same button you will get all the colors of your life back.
